generic.failure: %s, sorry an antenna broke somewhere! If this message persists contact Hal.
generic.useeDoesNotHaveAccount: %s, you do not have a broadcast station!
generic.userNotHaveAccount: %s, %s does not have a broadcast station.
generic.invalidIDorMention: %s, %s is not a valid user id or mention.
generic.cooldownMessage: Your frequency is too high please lower it.
generic.cannotDoToBots: %s, this action is not supported on bots

ping.description: No one asks how the bot is, only ping?
ping.fullDescription: Ask the bot to reply with 'Pong!'

create.accountCreated: %s, your account has been created! You are ready to broadcast!
create.accountCreationError: %s, there was an error creating your account, please try again later.
create.alreadyHasAccount: s, you already have an account!
create.description: Create a station with the Tower to start broadcasting.
create.fullDescription: Create an account to use the bot's features.

close.accountClosed: %s, your account has been closed! The airwaves will miss your broadcasts.
close.accountClosedError: %s, there was an error closing your account, please try again later.
close.closeConfirmation: %s, are you sure you want to close your account? Confirm with: `%d`, cancel with `cancel`
close.closeCancelled: %s, you have cancelled the closure of your broadcast station.
close.wrongCode: %s, that was not the confirmation code. Closing cancelled.
close.timeout: No repsonse recieved in time `10s` from %s, account closure cancelled.
close.description: Close up your station and taek down your antenna
close.fullDescription: Close your account to stop using the bot's features

follow.cannotFollowSelf: %s, you cannot tune into your own broadcasts.
follow.blockedByFollowee: %s, has blocked you %s, you cannot follow them!
follow.followeeBlocked: %s, you blocked %s, you cannot follow them!
follow.followSuccess: %s, you are now tuned into %s's broadcasts!
follow.followError: %s, there was an error tunining into %s's broadcasts, please try again later.
follow.followAlready: %s, you are already tuned into %s's broadcasts!
follow.fullDescription: Follow a user to recieve their posts.

unfollow.unfollowSuccess: %s, you are no longer following %s's broadcasts!
unfollow.unfollowError: %s, there was an error unfollowing %s, please try again later.
unfollow.fullDescription: Unfollow a user to stop getting their posts.

block.blockError: %s, there was an error blocking %s, please try again later.
block.description: Block a user to prevent them following you, also prevents you from following them.
block.fullDescription: Block a user to prevent them following you, also prevents you from following them.

unblock.cannotUnblockSelf: %s, you cannot unblock that which you cannot block.
unblock.unblockError: %s, there was an error unblocking %s, please try again later.
unblock.description: Unblocks a user allowing you to follow each other
unblock.fullDescription: Unblocks a user allowing you to follow each other

tagline.taglineTooLong: %s, sorry that's too long to be your tagline (limit is 140 characters).
tagline.taglineSetSuccess: %s, your tagline is now set to: %s
tagline.taglineSetError: %s, there was an error setting your tagline, please try again later.
tagline.description: Provide a brief descritption of your station.
tagline.fullDescription: View/set your tagline on your profile card.
tagline.usage: `b.tagline` to view current, `b.tagline text` to set new

bio.bioTooLong: %s, sorry that's too long to be your bio (limit is 400 characters).
bio.bioSetSuccess: %s, your bio is now set to: %s
bio.bioSetError: %s, there was an error setting your bio, please try again later.
bio.description: Provide a brief descritption of your station.
bio.fullDescription: View/set your tagline on your profile card.
bio.usage: `b.tagline` to view current, `b.tagline text` to set new

mature.matureIs: %s, your mature preference is set to `%s`.
mature.matureSetSuccess: %s, your mature preference is now set to `%s`.
mature.matureSetError: %s, there was an error setting your mature preference.
mature.fullDescription: Set your mature preference i.e. do you want
